name: justmytoots.com
description: This is a little website that works as an extension to Mastodon. It displays the toots but not the boosts for a particular user. It helps people that want to showcase their toots, for example when doing jokes, drawings, photos or any other form of content people might want to look back through.

scripts.buildCss: mkdir -p public/css && cat css/*.css | npx csso > public/css/main.css
scripts.buildJs: mkdir -p public/js && npx rollup js/main.js --format cjs | npx terser --compress -o public/js/main.js
scripts.build: for t in clean buildCss buildJs buildHtml copyRootFiles; do npm run $t; done
scripts.rmProxy: npm config rm proxy; npm config rm https-proxy
